trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brooksville
There were no other sightings in Brooksville on or around November 30th 1975
Summary: Metallic object came over our head VERY close
divs: Sighting DetailsI don't tell this very often since no-one believes me anyway, but I think it was 1976 near where I live now which is near some old mine pits, I was on the golf course with my girlfriend when I heard a noise sounded kinda like a motor whine which drew my attention to a pump station which was nearby at which time we saw coming over the trees the most awsome site I have ever seen. A flying saucer ? it was round, it was metallic colored and it did have light panels however I could not see inside or did not see any markings on the vessel. I did not see any exhaust and am not sure if the sound I heard had anything to do with the ufo or if it was the pump kicking in which just caught our attention. I did not notice a sound as it came over us and it was so low it was scary. It did not spin and I did not see legs hanging down or anything like that. My only saving grace is that my best friend had a sister working at the radio station here in town and when I told him the story her laughed then said that he guess it isn't that funny afterall, that alot of calls came in that night about a ufo siting. Anyway, I don't know if it was some NASA test craft or what, but I have yet to see anything else like it. I've never reported this since I didn't know how to go about it and also I really didn't want to be made into some nutcase like another ufo observer locally was. Now that I'm older, I wanted to make sure someone knew that might actually care. Thank you My other witness I no longer see, but I can contact if need be. She's married and in another state. I emailed her a couple years ago about this and she said hardly a day goes by that she doesn't think about it.
